TopicTitle: The Open Part Mod - Week of 4/25 project started

Articles.Content:
I didn't really want to end this right at 6:00. It was more of a guideline. I'll start putting together the poll now. I'll also comb through the thread for any other entries. It was a lot of fun watching people develop their parts and I look forward to participating in the next one! I'm glad that some people learned through this competition.

Edit: It has started! Go and vote!

Edited May 3, 2014 by StarVision

Why not just release what you have in the state that it's in? You know, like EA does?

The point of this project is partly to teach people about time management. If you release it at least you'll know based on votes how much time to devote next time.

Well it would be only a blender model, without textures or any detail. This isn't really a part. About 10min of work. I don't think that it's helpful. I'm stuck at figuring out how to add a chute...
